docs.text: bom-configuration Welcome to bom-configuration. This is an opinionated configuration library that will build a configuration from environment variables, command line arguments, local files, and global files. usage To start, you must define the environment you are using. The available environments are dev , qa , and prod . If you do not define an environment, you will receive an error. >>> from bom.configuration import load >>> load() ... ValueError: `ENV` environment variable must be specified. $ export ENV=dev >>> from bom.configuration import load >>> conf = load() {'bom': {'configuration': {'version': '1.0.0'}}} To modify the configuration, create a bom.conf.json file in the python library or create it inside the working directory of the application.
